name: ICDeviceBrowser
desc: An object for finding digital cameras and scanners.

items.name: delegate
items.desc: The object that acts as the delegate of the device browser.

items.name: isBrowsing
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the device browser is browsing for devices.

items.name: devices
items.desc: All devices found by the browser.

items.name: browsedDeviceTypeMask
items.desc: A mask whose set bits indicate the type of devices being browsed after the delegate receives the start message.

items.name: start
items.desc: Tells the delegate to start looking for devices.

items.name: stop
items.desc: Tells the delegate to stop looking for devices.

items.name: preferredDevice
items.desc: Returns a device object that the client application should select when it launches.
